title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the integration of FAST channels into MansaTV's content platforms, expanding streaming coverage from web-only to FireTV, Vizio, Samsung, and Android TV. Developed features for ad-driven FAST & VOD ingestion, along with admin tools and a CMS dashboard. These efforts increased MansaTV's reach to 300,000 viewers within a year and raised $8M In Seed Funding Round

title: Senior software Engineer
description: Developed the CLINPORTAL platform, a CMS for managing patient data and practices as part of the Inspire project, which aimed to innovate sleep apnea treatment. Collaborated with the team to design user-friendly interfaces, enhancing patient and practice interaction. The platform contributed to the success of the Inspire project by improving patient data management.

title: Software Engineer
description: I am a partner engineer at Andela, a global talent network for software developers. I mentored 139 learners in Angular, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS through the Google Africa Developer Scholarship. Provided technical expertise and facilitated workshops, helping learners build strong web development skills. Several mentees secured employment in the tech industry as a result.

title: Senior Software Developer
description: Led the development of FundsTrans and Lenderly projects, focusing on money remittance and auto-ID verification solutions. Advocated for best practices, including code documentation and REST API use, while mentoring the team and conducting interviews. These efforts improved financial operations, dropped KYC approval time from 1-2 weeks to seconds, and built a more skilled development team.

title: Solutions Developer
description: Led the integration of the bankâ€™s APIs with third-party services to enhance mobile and agent banking, supporting 22 ATMs, 23 branches, and 23 agents. Worked with a distributed IT team to ensure seamless service integration and accessibility. The integration expanded the bank's reach and improved service accessibility across Uganda.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Led the frontend development of DotShule, an e-Administration system for schools, focusing on a user-friendly interface that enhanced usability. The improved system led to the onboarding of 50 additional schools, achieving a 66% growth rate. DotShule is now used in over 80 schools across 7 districts in Uganda.

title: Application Developer
description: As an Evanto author, I built consumer scripts and plugins for the digital marketplace, CodeCanyon. During this time, I worked as a sole proprietor freelancer serving SaaP applications to clients and offering support services. I achieved a 5-star rating with over 144 sales.
